ComicInfo.Summary: The action in Frank Miller's Sin City continues at breakneck pace as Marv races toward a confrontation with Goldie's killer. Don't miss this chance to see the master of the comics medium cut loose! In The Creep, Oxel Karnhus, the acromegalic private eye, finally breaks down and buys a gun--and it's a good thing, `cause he's gonna need it! Story by John Arcudi, art by Dale Eaglesham. Finally, the Earth Boys return to Earth, only to find that the planet has changed its name so as not to be associated with the four dangerous youths! Story by Brett Brooks and Cliff Biggers, art by David Johnson. Full color cover by Frank Miller & Lynn Varley.
ComicInfo.Tags: Girls of Old Town,Marv (Sin City),Oxel Karnhus,Wendy (Sin City)
